value.name: Parameter Injection/Extraction
value.description: Injects any input parameters into the Node-Red msg object and attempts to extract any output parameters from the msg object with a matching key

value.name: Parameter Combiner (String)
value.description: Combines any input parameters into a string list type output

outputParameters.parameterDescription: A single list of all provided input parameters

value.name: Parameter Combiner (Number)
value.description: Combines any input parameters into a string list type output

outputParameters.parameterDescription: A single list of all provided input parameters

value.name: Parameter Combiner (Boolean)
value.description: Combines any input parameters into a string list type output

outputParameters.parameterDescription: A single list of all provided input parameters
